name: Mhd phot
body:
### HUACHO-MHD CODE.
The Huacho-MHD code project is a grid-based code for astrophysical magnetohydrodynamics (MHD).
This code includes a variety of numerical algorithms, such as different Riemann solvers and spatial reconstruction:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

The current version implements algorithms for the following physics:

photoionization
passive scalars advected with the flow,
static gravitational potential,
both isotropic and anisotropic thermal conduction,
optically-thin radiative cooling.

### In addition following grid and parallelization options are avilable:

--cartesian coordinates

--parallelization using domain decomposition and  MPI.

### Author:

####Alejandro Esquivel

###Contributors:

You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.
